attributes.title: This app is a trick
attributes.review: I saw on Facebook that this app is a trick from the generation “Z”. This app is fake and they use it to see where we are and what we are doing. Please help!!! If you rate it one star and say the same things I do then the apple must take it down. Please!!!

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️💕💕🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️❤️💕 not the greatest
attributes.review: There are so many glitches in the system, that our poor, poor president here refuses to fix. 🧚‍♀️ Maybe one day things will change. 💕💕💕America was never great. But maybe one day it will be💕💕💕🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💕💕💕💕who knows?🧚‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚

attributes.title: this made me hyperventilate
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support my wonderful president ✨🧚🏼‍♀️ donald trump 🧚🏼‍♀️✨ until as soon as i opened the app i started hyperventilating and immediately started to melt into my floor. i started to wonder how that could of happened and then i realized, my brain couldn’t consume any more of this nonsense that ✨🧚🏼‍♀️ donald trump🧚🏼‍♀️✨ puts in my brain. i quickly de- melted myself and deleted the app. ✨🧚🏼‍♀️ donald trump🧚🏼‍♀️✨ my lord and savior well at least he used to be, is now my biggest enemy.

attributes.title: Fake News 😤🤚(i thought this was angry birds)
attributes.review:
Overall, this just isn’t a good app at all. It looks gross aesthetically and it crashed my phone. Plus if this app were a person they’d smell like week old pastrami. No disrespect to trump though, Rest in Peace, King 👑🍊🕊 

-oh btw zero stars if i could

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: if i could this app would get a 0 star, THERE ARE SO MANY ADS, WHY? this app completely drains all the battery from my phone and has given my phone a virus! now my phone glitches all the time and the screen is all messed up! thanks trump!

attributes.title: awful it was just terrible
attributes.review: i don’t know where to begin but i’ll keep it short. this app is terrible and not needed AT ALL! no one should get this app let alone be looking at it. save space and time by not getting it.

attributes.title: Terrible made my cheetos puffs sag
attributes.review: man when i tell you as soon as I download this app my phone started glitching like it had some type of virus , made my screen turn orange and i dropped my water on my cheetos puffs bc i got scared do not recommend-10 🥱

attributes.title: TERRIBLE🤬🤬🤮🤮🤢
attributes.review: I got this app for my son 🤗👦but then found INAPPROPRIATE stuff on there!!!!!!🤬🤬😡😭😢😠 my son is the sweetest angel of all time 🥰😍😘🧚‍♀️👼 but I found HORRIBLE things that my son would never do!!!🤬🤬😡😡🥵🥵🤯🤯😠 I love our 🌌terrible🌌 president but this is UNACCEPTABLE!!!🤬🤬😡😡🥵👿👿👿👺👹😾😾 but I did research and found out he’s DEAD!!🕊💞 RIP trump but DONT GET THIS APP🤬🤬🤬😡😡😠😡😡🤬

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: As a ride or die republican I am truly horrified by this app and not to mention this app tracks every move one move my health started greatly deteriorating and I am now unable to get off my bed if I could give 0 stars i would

attributes.title: I’m so mad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president and keep up with recent events and ended up having to IMMEDIATELY delete it. I kept receiving viruses and pop up ads directing me to democratic and sketchy websites. Please don’t download this if you’re a true trump supporter 😔🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️
